artist: Author: Bill Brent; Author: Joe Biel; Publisher: Microcosm Publishing, Bloomington, Ind.
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Perfect bound volume, photomechanical image of figures on makeshift boat with letterpress text printed in color offset lithography on coated paper covers; 160 pp.
medium: Color and black-and-white offset lithography, letterpress; bound volume
title: Make a Zine: When Words and Graphics Collide
